plot: Thirty years after the murder of Manson Kilmore, the town of Coal Miners Gap have a new series of murders. The question is, is the killer human or something more? And what is the connection to Manson Kilmore and the deaths in 1975?
title: Manson Kilmore: The Night Caller of Coal Miners Holler Part Two - Payback Is Hell
plot_es: Thirty years after the murder of Manson Kilmore, the town of Coal Miners Gap have a new series of murders. The question is, is the killer human or something more? And what is the connection to Manson Kilmore and the deaths in 1975?
original_name: Manson Kilmore: The Night Caller of Coal Miners Holler Part Two - Payback Is Hell
